body_html: @Mazecreator: The way to express this in TensorFlow is to make two different pieces of graph that share variables (either explicitly or using variable scopes). You then run one part of the graph for training and one part for testing.
body_text: @Mazecreator: The way to express this in TensorFlow is to make two different pieces of graph that share variables (either explicitly or using variable scopes).  You then run one part of the graph for training and one part for testing.
body: @Mazecreator: The way to express this in TensorFlow is to make two different pieces of graph that share variables (either explicitly or using variable scopes).  You then run one part of the graph for training and one part for testing.
